sentences.en: "Now give me some account of your voyage." — "Very good, sir."
sentences.cn: “现在给我讲述一下你的航程吧。”——“非常乐意，先生。”

sentences.en: Afro-Americans account for 12% of the US population.
sentences.cn: 非裔美国人占美国人口的12%。

sentences.en: Bad weather accounted for the long delay.
sentences.cn: 长期的延缓是因为坏天气

sentences.en: by all accounts he is a pretty nice guy.
sentences.cn: 据说他是个非常好的人。

sentences.en: Can you account for your movements on that night?
sentences.cn: 你能说明一下你那天晚上的行踪吗？

sentences.en: Chomsky’s account of how children learn their first language
sentences.cn: 乔姆斯基关于儿童如何学习第一语言的描述

sentences.en: don't bother on my account.
sentences.cn: 不要为我多费神了。

sentences.en: he began trading on his own account.
sentences.cn: 他开始独立经商。

sentences.en: He figured up the balance in their checking account.
sentences.cn: 他算出了他们活期存款账户上的余额总和。

sentences.en: He gave a detailed account of what happened on the fateful night.
sentences.cn: 他详细描述了那个灾难性夜晚所发生的事。

sentences.en: He put Elizabeth's motel bill and airfare on his expense account.
sentences.cn: 他将伊丽莎白住汽车旅馆的费用和机票费用记在他的报销账目中。

sentences.en: His account contradicted itself.
sentences.cn: 他的解释自相矛盾。

sentences.en: I told him if he withdrew it was on his own account.
sentences.cn: 我告诉他，如果他退出，责任自负。

sentences.en: I'd like to check the balance in my account please.
sentences.cn: 请查一下我的账户余额。

sentences.en: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.cn: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.en: It has, from all accounts, been a successful marriage.
sentences.cn: 谁都说这是一桩美满的婚姻。

sentences.en: It was permissible to take account of antecedent legislation.
sentences.cn: 允许考虑先前的法律。

sentences.en: Ministers should be called to account for their actions.
sentences.cn: 部长们应该对他们的行为作出解释。

sentences.en: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.cn: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

sentences.en: My salary is paid into my bank account
sentences.cn: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.en: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.cn: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.en: She gave the police a full account of the incident.
sentences.cn: 她向警方详尽地叙述了所发生的事情。

sentences.en: Some banks charge if you access your account to determine your balance.
sentences.cn: 有些银行对查询账户余额要收费。

sentences.en: The accounts for last year showed a profit of $2 million.
sentences.cn: 去年的账目显示利润为200万美元。

sentences.en: the Biblical account of the creation of the world
sentences.cn: 《圣经》对创世的解释

sentences.en: The defendant asked for 21 similar offences to be taken into account.
sentences.cn: 被告要求考虑到类似的21起违法行为的情况。

sentences.en: The direction of the prevailing winds should be taken into account.
sentences.cn: 应该将盛行风的方向考虑在内。

sentences.en: The suspect couldn't account for his time that night.
sentences.cn: 嫌疑犯不能说明那天晚上他的时间安排

sentences.en: There has been a very one-sided account of her problems with Ted.
sentences.cn: 关于她与特德的问题，有一则非常片面的报道。

sentences.en: This basic utilitarian model gives a relatively unsophisticated account of human behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这个实用的基础模型较为简略地解释了人类的行为。

sentences.en: Together they account for less than five per cent of the population.
sentences.cn: 他们总共占不到总人口的5%。

sentences.en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.cn: 你必须将该处房产的资本增值考虑在内。

sentences.en: You must account to father what you have done.
sentences.cn: 你必须把你的所作所为对父亲解释清楚。

words.tran_cn: 有责任的；有解释义务的；可解释的

phrases.tran_cn: 在某人帐上重视，	记帐
银行存款；银行往来帐户
资本性帐户；固定资产帐户
活期存款；支票户头；活期存款户头

phrases.phrase: give a good (或 bad) account of oneself

phrases.tran_cn: 没用的；无交易；未交帐户；无会计科目

phrases.phrase: take something into account (或 take account of)
phrases.tran_cn: （在决定或行动之前）将…考虑进去

phrases.phrase: there's no accounting for tastes (或 taste)

trans.tran_cn: 账号；账目，账单，赊购，描述，解释，老主顾
trans.tran_en: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out
to give a satisfactory explanation of why something has happened or why you did something
